answers.answer: I bloated to but started taking fiber to help with that. I started showing around the 5th month. Otherwise baby was so small before that,and swelling in the abdominal area was due to bloating. Rice pasta and bread made it worse for me
In fact now that I think about it, I didn't actually feel any good movements from my baby until about week 20. I was hoping to feel them sooner being this is my second baby.

I'm already showing I'm only 12 weeks but my doctor said the more times you've been pregnant the thinner your linning is so I show quicker feel the baby sooner. This will be my 5 child 8 pregnancy but its totally different all the morning sickness just been a nasty start

I have a large placenta. Some woman placenta grows larger than the baby which will make you look bigger than the baby really is. I got pregnant in Aug and was clearly showing in October. Also I was told that by having gestational diabetes while pregnant can cause you to look bigger than normal as well.
I'm 20, will be 21 weeks in a couple days and still not showing. I have a tiny little pudgy that nobody can even see

question: I'm only 10.5 weeks and feel like I'm looking a little pudgie. I know it's probably from being bloated. When did you first start showing?
title: start showing
